mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jane Pauley interviews Robert T. Canevari
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Marshall, Michael
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: Jane Pauley interviewed Dean of Students Robert T. Canevari in the garden of Pavilion IX on September 3, 1991 for a segment on Real Life with Jane Pauley that will look at how students make moral choices once free from the immediate influence of their parents. The story, scheduled to air September 20, will focus especially on the experiences of students arrested in the spring fraternity drug raids.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
